kbs.name: Modryn Oreyn
kbs.description: the player's superior in the Fighters Guild

kbs.name: Argonian
kbs.description: a member of the Blackwood Company who was interrogated by Modryn Oreyn

plots: the information Modryn Oreyn got from the Argonian was valuable
the player will be on their own: they should steer clear of their fellow Fighters Guild members

quest.title: Infiltration
quest.objective: infiltrate the Blackwood Company, and find the secret of their success
tasks: Find your way to Leyawiin.
join the Blackwood Company
infiltrate the Blackwood Company, and find the secret of their success
quest.description:
While the information we got from the Argonian was valuable, we need more. I want you to infiltrate them. See how they work from the inside.
I want you to get to Leyawiin and join the Blackwood Company. Find the secret of their success. You'll be on your own. Steer clear of me and all of your Fighters Guild brothers. It'll be rough going, but you can do it.
Good luck.

kbs.name: Hofgrir Horse-Crusher
kbs.description: the man with the the strongest arms in all of Skyrim

plots: rules for the fistfight: no weapons, no tricks, no magic

quest.title: Bloody Nose
quest.objective: win the wager against Hofgrir Horse-Crusher
tasks: match Hofgrir Horse-Crusher's bet, and beat him in a fistfight
win the wager against Hofgrir Horse-Crusher
quest.description:
Bah, I'm not afraid of anything out here. Walls are just a weakling's hiding spot. Now me, I'm no weakling. In fact, I bet I've got the strongest arms in all of Skyrim.
You bet against me? Oh! Sounds like I've got a challenger. Tell you what. How about a friendly wager, just between us. I bet you my entire purse of septims I can beat you in a fistfight. You match the bet and we fight until one of us gives in.
All right, remember... this is a clean fight. No weapons, no tricks. And none of those fancy magic spells, either. Here we go!

kbs.name: Shadeleaf Copse
kbs.description: a part of the Great Forest northeast of here

kbs.name: Elixir of Exploration
kbs.description: a multi-purpose potion for dungeon explorers

plots: the player has brought Sinderion a sample of Nirnroot for examination
the Elixir of Exploration requires Nirnroot
the formula for the Elixir of Exploration describes many magnitudes of the brew: Sinderion wrote a short missive about it for the Imperial Alchemy Symposium

quest.title: Seeking Your Roots
quest.objective: collect more Nirnroot
tasks: Head to Shadeleaf Copse.
collect 10 samples of Nirnroot for Sinderion
collect more Nirnroot
quest.description:
So, you've brought something for me to examine?
Yes, this is a genuine Nirnroot sample. Very nice quality in fact. Hmmm... that gives me an idea. Since you already know what they look like, do you feel up to a bit of a collecting expedition?
A few years ago, an adventurer not unlike yourself sold me a musty old tome containing alchemical formulas. Most of them were worthless. But one of the moldy pages contained the recipe for a potion known as an Elixir of Exploration, a sort of "ultimate dungeon delver's" brew. The formula looked sound, except it required an extremely rare ingredient. Yes, you guessed it, the Nirnroot. I put the book aside, because frankly, I had so many other delicate experiments going on that I just didn't have the time to go plant hunting. Now that you're here, that changes things.
The Elixir of Exploration is a multi-purpose potion that was obviously created with the dungeon explorer in mind. The formula describes many magnitudes of the brew. If you're interested, I wrote a short missive about it for the Imperial Alchemy Symposium. You bring me 10 samples of Nirnroot, and I'll make the Elixir of Exploration available to you at a huge discount as well as give you one for free.
The best place for you to start would be Shadeleaf Copse, which is a part of the Great Forest northeast of here. Good luck, and hurry back with more of the Nirnroot!

kbs.name: Cara
kbs.description: a woman who wants to dye her hair

plots: Cara wants reputation

quest.title: Turning Heads
quest.objective: give red dye to Cara
tasks: Make your way to wandering traders.
find red dye
give red dye to Cara
quest.description:
The guys in this village rarely take note of me. I want to dye my hair red to make myself more attractive.
Wandering traders often have red dye. Could you find some and give it to me? I'd give you 12 emeralds for the red dye.

kbs.name: Isabelle Rolaine
kbs.description: a young, beautiful woman, and Ranmir's lost love

kbs.name: Ranmir
kbs.description: a male drunk who used to be happy with Isabelle Rolaine

plots: Ranmir is sure that Isabelle Rolaine ran away with Vex

quest.title: Drowned Sorrows
quest.objective: find Isabelle Rolaine
tasks: Go to Riften.
talk to Vex about Isabelle Rolaine
find Isabelle Rolaine
quest.description:
I'm Dagur, an innkeeper.
I wondered if I could ask a favor of you. It's about Ranmir. Don't get me wrong, I don't have a problem with him being in my inn all the time. He mostly keeps to himself, and so far he's been able to pay. I just hate to see what's happened to him. He hasn't always been like this, you know. Drunk, I mean.
He was a different person. Happy, outgoing... Like anyone who's in love. See, Ranmir was involved with a pretty young woman named Isabelle Rolaine. The two of them were very happy together, I thought. One day, she just disappeared. Ranmir was convinced she'd run off with someone else, leaving him behind. He turned to drinking, and what's left of him is what you see here every day.
I hoped that maybe if she could be found, if he had some sort of explanation, that maybe he could put himself back together. I'm in no position to go searching for her, but perhaps you could. Ranmir seemed convinced that Isabelle'd run off to Riften with someone named Vex. That's all I remember.

kbs.name: High Fane
kbs.description: an ancient Ayleid settlement known by a different name today

plots: the player has obtained artifacts for Umbacano before
Umbacano gives the player a sketch depicting the High Fane: the High Fane dates from the Late Ayleid Period, following the fall of White Gold Tower
the drawing on the bottom of the page Umbacano gave the player depicts a carved panel from the central chamber of the High Fane
Umbacano gives the player the key to the inner chamber of the High Fane

quest.title: Nothing You Can Possess
quest.objective: retrieve a decorative carving from the High Fane for Umbacano
tasks: locate the ruins of the High Fane
retrieve a decorative carving from the High Fane for Umbacano
quest.description:
You have proven yourself more than a simple grave robber. I believe you can handle a more complicated assignment. Are you interested?
Here, take a look at this sketch. The ancient texts refer to this site only as the "High Fane." Do you know it? Your first task is to locate the ruins of the High Fane. I believe it must now be known by a different name.
The High Fane dates from the Late Ayleid Period, following the fall of White Gold Tower, a very troubled time for that ancient people. A time I find most fascinating. The drawing on the bottom of the page I gave you depicts a carved panel from the central chamber of the High Fane. I believe this carving will shed new light on Ayleid history, if I am able to examine it closely. I would like you to retrieve it for me.
You will need this as well. It is the key to the inner chamber of the High Fane. I part with it reluctantly, so guard it well. It is what began my search for the High Fane, many years ago.

kbs.name: Traven
kbs.description: the player's guildleader in the Mages Guild

kbs.name: Mannimarco
kbs.description: the king of worms, the leader of the necromancers

plots: with Traven's gem in the player's possession, the player will be impervious to Mannimarco's attempt to enthrall them
Traven will die after giving the quest to the player

quest.title: Confront the King
quest.objective: defeat Mannimarco once and for all
tasks: get Traven's gem after speaking with Traven, and seek out Mannimarco
defeat Mannimarco once and for all
quest.description:
Hear me, and hear me well. Mannimarco will have what he seeks, but it will be his undoing at your hands.
With this gem in your possession, you will be impervious to his attempt to enthrall you. When he fails, that is when you shall strike. When we are done speaking, you will take this gem, you will then seek out Mannimarco, and destroy him. Get to him anyway you can. It is your only hope for defeating him. I have full confidence in you, and so I leave the guild in your care.
When I am gone, you will be recognized as Arch-Mage and leader of the Guild. Lead your fellow mages, and lead them well. The future rests on your shoulders.
Farewell, my friend.

kbs.name: Rythe
kbs.description: Tivela Lythandas' husband, and one of the best painters in all Cyrodiil

plots: Rythe makes lifelike paintings about the Great Forest
Rythe keeps his studio locked: he did not come out of his studio for a full day
Tivela Lythandas unlocked the studio with the key Rythe said to use only in emergencies: Rythe was not inside his studio
Tivela Lythandas gives the player the key to Rythe's studio
Tivela Lythandas will be around the house should the player need her

quest.title: A Brush with Death
quest.objective: help Tivela Lythandas find her husband who has gone missing
tasks: Proceed to Rythe's painting studio.
find clues about Rythe's whereabouts
help Tivela Lythandas find her husband who has gone missing
quest.description:
I'm Tivela Lythandas. I apologize that I can't give you the respect a guest in my home would normally receive, but I am at my wit's end. I am sorry to be so forward, but I desperately need your help. It seems that my husband, Rythe, has gone missing, and I just don't know what to do.
Rythe is known far and wide as one of the best painters in all Cyrodiil. His specialty is setting the Great Forest to canvas. The paintings look so amazingly real that some say they can see the trees sway in the breeze. That's a silly notion of course, but it just goes to show the attention to detail Rythe uses when he paints.
Rythe likes to work in his studio with the door locked, so no one can disturb him. He usually comes out to eat dinner and sleep, but two days ago, he didn't come out at all. At first, I wasn't worried. He does that occasionally. But when he didn't come out for a full day, I unlocked the studio with the key he said to use only in emergencies. It turned out he wasn't inside! I'm sure he never left that room. So I have no idea where he's gone.
Please. Help me find Rythe. I love him dearly, and I am so worried. Here's the key to Rythe's studio. You may come and go as you please. If you need me, I'll be around the house.

plots: Aldeth Sashenstar has been holed up in a cabin for several days
the savages threatened Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends to stop hunting
the savages killed Elban

quest.title: Aldeth and the Group of Savages
quest.objective: protect Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends from a group of savages
tasks: prepare for the savages' attack on Aldeth Sashenstar's cottage
protect Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends from a group of savages
quest.description:
I am Aldeth Sashenstar. You must understand that at the moment, I'm under a terrible amount of stress.
You see, my dear friend, there is a group of uncouth savages that has declared their intention of killing my friends and me. I've been holed up in this cabin for several days and have lacked the wherewithal to try to make an escape.
My friends and I come here every year to do some sport hunting. This year however, a group of woodland savages threatened us with bodily harm if we did not stop our hunting trip. Being civilized men, we realized that it's well within our rights to hunt where we damn well please. After a few more days of hunting, the crass woodmen lost all pretense of humanity and murdered Elban, one of my oldest friends.
I'm sure that they plan to attack our cottage here, so we had best be prepared.

kbs.name: Coran
kbs.description: the player's old friend, and a strong warrior

plots: Coran and Safana were traveling Forest of Tethir: Safana was kidnapped by wolfweres
Coran managed to escape from wolfweres
Coran will go with the player: Coran will help the player save Safana

quest.title: Coran and the Wolfweres
quest.objective: save Safana from wolfweres
tasks: Arrive at an encampment east of here.
kill wolfweres
save Safana from wolfweres
quest.description:
Hail, good friend! I am most pleased to see you here! Your timing could not be better, as I, Coran, am in most dire need!
I was traveling Forest of Tethir with my beloved Safana... and now she is kidnapped! It is dreadful! Two days ago, we were beset by giant wolves... wolfweres, I fear. They tried to take us both, but I was able to escape. Safana, however, was not so fortunate. I tracked them to an encampment east of here, but even a great warrior such as myself cannot beat them alone.
We must save her and strike a blow against the foul werebeasts! Together, we shall be unstoppable!

kbs.name: Sir Ralvas
relations: a shrine to Saint Kaladas, below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin

kbs.name: a shrine to Saint Kaladas, below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin
kbs.description: a shrine to Saint Kaladas, below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin

kbs.name: Zenithar
kbs.description: the god of work and commerce, one of the Nine
relations: a shrine to Saint Kaladas, below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin

kbs.name: Saint Kaladas
relations: a shrine to Saint Kaladas, below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin

plots: the player has passed the gauntlet unlike others in three hundred years: the player can redeem the souls of the ghost knights and restore their order
Sir Ralvas placed his own will and lust for fame over the will of the Nine
Sir Ralvas failed the challenge of Zenithar: the inscription for the challenge says to "walk in the faith"
the player must pray at the shrine of Saint Kaladas to receive a vision: the player will see the Mace of Zenithar, separated from them by a great chasm
Sir Ralvas fell from the platform each time he tried to cross the chasm

quest.title: The Path of the Righteous
quest.objective: retrieve the Mace of Zenithar for yourself
tasks: Travel to a shrine to Saint Kaladas, below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin.
complete the challenge of Zenithar
retrieve the Mace of Zenithar for yourself
quest.description:
You have my, Sir Ralvas', tribute, sir knight. In three hundred years, none have passed the gauntlet. In three hundred years, we have never known hope. But for the first time, it seems that someone may succeed where we have failed. I see in you the chance to redeem our souls and restore the order. And now, I must ask you to press forward where I could not. I must ask you to face the challenge of Zenithar.
I was arrogant and foolhardy. I sought personal glory. I placed my own will and my own lust for fame over the will of the Nine. In facing the challenge of Zenithar, I failed. I tried dozens -- no, hundreds of times to reach the Mace. I fell each time. And each time I awoke in the chapel, I leaped again. I tried to enlist the help of the other knights, but none would come to my aid. The inscription says to "walk in the faith" but even now, I do not know what this means.
Below the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin there is a shrine to the great craftsman, Saint Kaladas. Those seeking the Mace must pray before the shrine. When you bow, you will receive a vision -- or perhaps not. It is unclear. The priests saw that my body never moved, but it felt so real. You will see the Mace of Zenithar, separated from you by a great chasm. The chasm represents your doubt. Your faith must be your guide across it.
This is what I know. As I said, my faith was weak. I did not understand the test and I fell from the platform each time I tried to cross. I have told you all that I know. All that is left is for you to prove yourself more worthy than I. If you seek the Mace, travel to Leyawiin's chapel, kneel at the shrine in the undercroft, and let your faith in the Nine be the salvation of us all.

plots: Feran Sadri gives the player Dawnguard armor, and a note for framing the Dawnguard

quest.title: Deceiving the Herd
quest.objective: frame the Dawnguard for murder
tasks: Go to Whiterun.
murder someone influential in public while wearing Dawnguard armor and plant a note on the victim
frame the Dawnguard for murder
quest.description:
The Dawnguard have increased their operations and have been aggressively recruiting in Whiterun.
We need to put a damper on their efforts and give those trouble makers something to worry about other than harassing our interests.
You are to make a public show of murdering someone. Do it in the streets for all to see. The higher the profile the better. Someone attached to the court, a merchant, a bard, a priest, someone with stature. Make it seem you are a member of the Dawnguard, thus sowing confusion among the herd. Wear this armor and plant this note on the victim.
The people will put pressure on the Dawnguard who are apparently murdering their fellows without provocation. Their focus will be shifted from us, giving us one less nuisance to deal with.

plots: a storm sank the player's ship
there are beasts outside the village wall

quest.title: Durlyle's Task
quest.objective: bring the cloak that draped the village center back to Durlyle
tasks: Make your way to beyond the village wall.
find the cloak
bring the cloak that draped the village center back to Durlyle
quest.description:
I am Durlyle, and I am glad to be meeting. I have but a mundane task to ask of you, if you hear me out?
The storm you felt that took your ship? It was fierce here too, and a cloak that draped the village center was cast to the wind. I think it is beyond the wall, and will not risk the beasts to get it. Will you?

kbs.name: Lucien Lachance
kbs.description: the player's superior in the Dark Brotherhood, giving quest via "Dead Drop Orders #3"

kbs.name: J'Ghasta
kbs.description: a Khajiit nobleman, and a skilled hand to hand fighter

plots: "Dead Drop Orders #3" has been addressed toward the player: the player is a Silencer of the Dark Brotherhood
J'Ghasta turned down the offer to marry a prominent Cyrodiil noble's daughter: the noble hired the Dark Brotherhood to kill J'Ghasta
J'Ghasta is aware someone may be trying to kill him, and has bribed the guards not to interfere if a fight should spill out into the Bruma streets

quest.title: Broken Vows
quest.objective: assassinate J'Ghasta
tasks: Arrive at J'Ghasta's house in Bruma.
find J'Ghasta
assassinate J'Ghasta
quest.description:
Dead Drop Orders #3
by Lucien Lachance

Are you ready to get your hands dirty, Silencer?
Your next target is a Khajiit nobleman by the name of J'Ghasta, who can be found at his home in the city of Bruma. J'Ghasta was recently offered the hand of a prominent Cyrodiil noble's daughter, but turned down the offer when he learned of the girl's rather negligible dowry. The girl's family is outraged, of course, and has hired the Dark Brotherhood to make J'Ghasta pay for his insolence.
Go to J'Ghasta's house in Bruma and end his miserable life. But be warned! The Khajiit is rich and bored, and spends most of his time honing his skills in unarmed combat. Any opponent who can kill with merely his hands is not to be trifled with, so tread carefully. Even worse, J'Ghasta is aware someone may be trying to kill him, and has bribed the guards not to interfere if a fight should spill out into the city streets.
When the target has been eliminated, you will find your next dead drop in a rotten box under the Old Bridge, just south of the Imperial City. The box will contain your reward for killing J'Ghasta, as well as information regarding your next contract.

kbs.name: Bellethe
kbs.description: a worried wife, and a passionate animal owner

kbs.name: Widow's Veil
kbs.description: a cave inhabited by nasty creatures

plots: Bellethe and Finnas are homesteaders with a small farm in the Frosted Hills: they went to get supplies from Estherian Enclave before winter

quest.title: Little Lost Ones
quest.objective: help Bellethe find Finnas and their precious animals
tasks: Travel to Widow's Veil.
find Finnas
help Bellethe find Finnas and their precious animals
quest.description:
Please, help me! Our dear little ones wandered into that cave! My husband Finnas ventured after them, but it is crawling with nasty creatures, and he hasn't returned!
My husband Finnas and I were on our way to the Estherian Enclave. We're homesteaders, with a small farm in the Frosted Hills. The weather is getting harsh, so we were making one last run for supplies before winter. Oh, I'm beside myself with worry! Please, find Finnas and our precious babies! You have to help us! You could have a special item as a token of our gratitude!

kbs.name: Potema's Catacombs
kbs.description: catacombs filled with Potema's undead minions

kbs.name: Potema, the Wolf Queen
kbs.description: a former queen of Solitude, and one of the most dangerous necromancers in recorded history

kbs.name: Arkay
kbs.description: the god of life and death

plots: Potema was responsible for the Empire's near collapse almost five hundred years ago: Styrr has a book about Potema
one of Potema's servants busted through a wall into the Temple of Divines
the player was there when Potema was summoned in spirit form
Styrr helps the player with Potema's minions

quest.title: The Wolf Queen Awakened
quest.objective: stop Potema from returning to the living
tasks: Go to Potema's Catacombs.
find Potema's skeleton and remove it from the catacombs
bring Potema's skeleton back to be sanctified by Arkay
stop Potema from returning to the living
quest.description:
Ah Potema, the Wolf Queen. Former queen of Solitude and one of the most dangerous necromancers in recorded history. She was responsible for the Empire's near collapse almost five hundred years ago. I believe I have a book about her...
And now Potema has been summoned in spirit form. Summoned in spirit form is not raised from the dead. She'll need help before she can return to the living.
For the moment, the Wolf Queen has retreated to a place filled with dead eager to serve her. She has gone to her old Catacombs. A few days ago, one of her servants busted through a wall into the Temple of Divines. We'll need you to go into the Catacombs themselves.
You were there when Potema was summoned. Being at the summoning created a connection to Potema, you are the one to stop her from returning to the living. I can provide you with some help with her minions.
As to Potema herself, find what's left of her body, likely a skeleton. Remove it from the Catacombs and bring it back to be sanctified by Arkay.

kbs.name: Ghost of Old Hroldan
kbs.description: an ancient ghost of a soldier

kbs.name: Hjalti
kbs.description: Ghost of Old Hroldan's long-dead brother-in-arms

plots: the Ghost of Old Hroldan thinks that the player is Hjalti

quest.title: The Ghost of Old Hroldan
quest.objective: put the Ghost of Old Hroldan to rest
tasks: find Hjalti's sword ,and give it to the Ghost of Old Hroldan
put the Ghost of Old Hroldan to rest
quest.description:
You don't remember me, Hjalti? Two campaigns we served together. You saved my life time and time again. You promised me, Hjalti. You promised that when we sacked Hroldan, you would make me your sworn brother.
And I've waited. Even after the enemies' arrows dug into my chest and their hammers crushed my bones. I've waited.
Give me your sword, Hjalti. That we may become brothers as you promised.

kbs.name: Euric
kbs.description: Nadine's youngest son, who knows how to take care of himself

plots: Euric ran away from home
Nadine gives the player a good luck talisman

quest.title: Nadine and Euric
quest.objective: give Euric a good luck talisman and return to Nadine
tasks: find Euric
give Euric a good luck talisman and return to Nadine
quest.description:
I, Nadine, desperately need someone's help.
Euric, my youngest son, has run away again... He's always had a touch of the wanderer in him and he knows how to take care of himself, but... Oh, I'm just worried sick. This city gets more dangerous every day... If you find him, could you give him this good luck talisman? I'm sure we'd all sleep a little better.
Let me give you this necklace as a token of my thanks upon your return. I don't know if it's worth anything but it has been in the family for years.

plots: the player survived Fazeer Shah's first task with the Tu'tara

quest.title: The Djinni's Next Task
quest.objective: complete Fazeer Shah's second task
tasks: Head to Portal.
survive
complete Fazeer Shah's second task
quest.description:
You survived the Tu'tara more or less in one piece. Congratulations. But it occurs to me that you didn't do anything that you wouldn't ordinarily have done. This second task should prove much more amusing.
Step through the Portal. Your second task... is to survive!

kbs.name: Kud-Ei
kbs.description: the player's superior in the Mages Guild

kbs.name: Ardaline
kbs.description: a female mage who is bullied by Varon Vamori

plots: the player asked a recommendation from Kud-Ei
Varon Vamori stole Ardaline's mage's staff
Kud-Ei gives the player a scroll with a powerful Illusion charm spell

quest.title: Mixed Feelings
quest.objective: recover Ardaline's mage's staff
tasks: charm Varon Vamori and make him tell you where Ardaline's mage's staff is
recover Ardaline's mage's staff
quest.description:
I'm afraid I haven't had time to prepare anything conventional for your recommendation. I'm very preoccupied with this situation concerning Ardaline.
Perhaps you can help with that, however. I can't directly get involved, for fear of embarrassing the poor girl. Varon Vamori's been bothering Ardaline every day for a while now. He even stole her Mages' Staff! Perhaps he thinks it's amusing; I don't know. But it needs to stop. It's making her miserable.
I'll need you to have a little chat with Varon Vamori to get Ardaline's staff back, and you can learn something about the power of Illusion in the process. Take this charm scroll. With it, you should find Varon more receptive to questioning.
Don't come back without that staff. I'll write you a recommendation for your help.

kbs.name: Draconian Madstone
kbs.description: an Akaviri artifact, an amulet that protects its wearer from poisons of any type, looks like a snake coiled around and encircling itself: the eyes of the snake are precious gems

plots: the player has seen Akaviri relics displayed by Countess Narina Carvain
Countess Narina Carvain gives the player a translation of an Akaviri messenger's translated diary, a rough map and a unique key that may help the player in the ruins in Pale Pass

quest.title: Lifting the Vale
quest.objective: bring the Draconian Madstone to Countess Narina Carvain
tasks: Proceed to the ruins in Pale Pass.
find the Draconian Madstone
bring the Draconian Madstone to Countess Narina Carvain
quest.description:
Allow me to formally introduce myself. I'm Countess Narina Carvain. I assume you've noticed all of the Akaviri relics I'm displaying.
Well, it's safe to say I'm a collector of sorts. I've invested a great deal of time and money acquiring these bits of ancient history. In fact, I'd be so bold as to proclaim my collection the most complete in all Cyrodiil; perhaps even beyond. Except for one thing.
A particular relic has eluded me for many years. Possessing this piece of Akaviri antiquity would make my collection complete. I'm of course referring to The Draconian Madstone. The stone is a fine bit of Akaviri craftsmanship. Worn like an amulet, this talisman is said to protect the wearer from poisons of any type. The talisman appears as a snake coiled around and encircling itself. The eyes of the snake are supposed to be precious gems or some such. Through my sources, I've learned that the last reported location of the Draconian Madstone was the ruins at Pale Pass.
If you retrieve the Draconian Madstone for me, I'll be happy to compensate you by rewarding you with another Akaviri artifact. Are you in the game?
Let me tell you how you're going to find the talisman. I've come into the possession of a diary written by an Akaviri messenger. I suspect that the text within can lead you to the ruins. Here's a translation of the passages we could still read. It was quite damaged. I've also included a rough map that was drawn in the diary as well. I'm also providing you with a unique key that was supposedly found with the diary. I'm assuming it will prove useful when you arrive at the site.

plots: Olivia wants reputation
Olivia gives the player seeds that can be used to tame a parrot

quest.title: A Talkative Pet
quest.objective: bring a tamed parrot to Olivia
tasks: Reach jungles.
tame a parrot
bring a tamed parrot to Olivia
quest.description:
My mommy and daddy say that I can't go outside the village. I don't! But I really wanna have a parrot. The other kids would certainly like me better if I had a cool pet like a parrot!
You a big enough to travel to places on your own without your parents. Traveler, please tame a parrot and bring it to me. I even have some seeds for you: tame the parrot with them. Parrots live in jungles.
I will give you this diamond I once found on the ground. Even a kid like me knows that those are valuable.

plots: Luke wants comfort
the player is a friend of Luke

quest.title: Sweet Dreams
quest.objective: give a green bed to Luke
tasks: obtain a green bed
give a green bed to Luke
quest.description:
I hate working the forge all day long. People should learn to make their tools themselves! Arrgh!
I'm sorry friend. I'm just feeling quite cranky at the moment. My bed is all lumpy and uncomfortable. If only I had a better bed. That would surely improve my mood!
Could you, perhaps, obtain a bed for me? I'd prefer a green bed. Help your friend get rest at night. I'd be even willing to part from 32 emeralds for a good bed.

kbs.name: Modryn Oreyn
kbs.description: the player's superior in the Fighters Guild

kbs.name: Galtus Previa
kbs.description: a fellow member of the Fighters Guild, a missing man

kbs.name: Viranus Donton
kbs.description: a fellow member of the Fighters Guild, Vilena Donton's son

kbs.name: Vilena Donton
kbs.description: the female guildmaster of the Fighters Guild, protective of Viranus Donton

kbs.name: Vitellus Donton
kbs.description: a fellow member of the Fighters Guild, Viranus Donton's older brother, Vilena Donton's eldest son

plots: Vitellus Donton was killed in action recently: the player may have seen the other wounded around

quest.title: The Master's Son
quest.objective: bolster Viranus Donton's confidence by find Galtus Previa in Nonwyll Cavern with Viranus Donton
tasks: Make your way to Donton house.
take Viranus Donton on a mission with you
bolster Viranus Donton's confidence by find Galtus Previa in Nonwyll Cavern with Viranus Donton
quest.description:
I've got another job for you, slightly off the record. You'll be going on a mission with Viranus Donton. Yes -- the guildmaster's son.
You're to accompany him, and make sure he succeeds. He needs some time in the field, to get his confidence up, or he'll never become a good warrior. Vilena coddles the boy too much. Doesn't want him in the line of fire. Suppose it's no surprise after Vitellus.
Vitellus was Vilena Donton's eldest son. Good man. We lost him on a botched mission recently. You've probably seen the other wounded around. If you're smart, you'll steer clear of the subject around the guildmaster. Perhaps you and I will have time to discuss it more later.
Viranus' mother's been holding him back, protecting him. You'll go to Nonwyll Cavern with him. Galtus Previa was lost there, and you're to find him. And not a word of this to the guildmaster! Go find him. He'll be in the Donton house, most likely. And bring him back in one piece!

kbs.name: Ocheeva
kbs.description: the player's superior in the Dark Brotherhood

kbs.name: Summitmist Manor
kbs.description: a large manor house in Skingrad

plots: the guests falsely believe that they cannot leave Summitmist Manor before finding a chest containing gold and the key to Summitmist Manor
the door to Summitmist Manor will be locked behind the player until the other guests are dead: the doorman will explain the rest

quest.title: Whodunit?
quest.objective: assassinate the other five guests at the party
tasks: Head to Summitmist Manor.
talk to the doorman
assassinate the other five guests at the party
quest.description:
Do you like parties? Because you've been invited to one. Of course you'll be killing all the other guests. Each guest, at some point in the past, wronged their mysterious host. Now he's hired us to exact his revenge. Are you ready to attend?
You need to go to the city of Skingrad, to the large house known as Summitmist Manor. There you will meet up with five very unlucky guests. In order to receive your bonus, you must kill each guest secretly, one by one. If anyone sees you committing murder, the bonus is forfeit. The guests believe there is a chest of gold hidden in the house, and have agreed to be locked inside until one of them finds it. In fact, the guests believe the key to the manor is inside the chest, and only by satisfying their greed will they be allowed to leave. Poor fools. There is, of course, no chest of gold. The guests will find no key. After you arrive, the doors will be locked behind you, as everyone expects. When all the guests lie dead, you will be free to leave.
Now go, see the doorman at Summitmist Manor. He will explain the rest. Have fun.

kbs.name: Llevana Nedaren
relations: County Hall, in the Cheydinhal castle

kbs.name: County Hall, in the Cheydinhal castle
kbs.description: County Hall, in the Cheydinhal castle

kbs.name: Ulrich Leland
kbs.description: the corrupted male captain of the guard

kbs.name: Garrus Darelliun
kbs.description: the male second-in-command of the guard, who is not too happy about his captain Ulrich Leland

plots: Llevana Nedaren does not know the player
Ulrich Leland is fining the citizens of Cheydinhal enthusiastically

quest.title: Corruption and Conscience
quest.objective: do something about Ulrich Leland
tasks: Proceed to County Hall, in the Cheydinhal castle.
speak to Garrus Darelliun, the second-in-command of the guard, about Ulrich Leland
do something about Ulrich Leland
quest.description:
You seem far too nice to be one of Ulrich Leland's men. What can I do for you?
Don't even get me started about Ulrich. That madman won't be satisfied until everyone in town is dead broke...or in jail! What in Oblivion is Ulrich doing with all that money anyway? I'm sure he's lining his pockets with the gold of the good citizens of Cheydinhal.
There's only one man who seems to care: Garrus Darelliun, the second-in-command of the guard. I hear he isn't happy with Ulrich. I don't know what you can do for us in this situation. I mean, Ulrich Leland is the Captain after all.
Perhaps you could speak to Garrus. You can find him roaming the County Hall of the castle most of the time.

kbs.name: Wolfskull Cave
kbs.description: a cave that is said to be haunted because of Potema the Wolf Queen's necromantic rituals some 500 years ago

plots: Falk Firebeard thinks that checking out the Wolfskull Cave is not worth his time with the war going on

quest.title: The Man Who Cried Wolf
quest.objective: investigate the reports of strange happenings near Wolfskull Cave
tasks: Go to Wolfskull Cave.
clear out the Wolfskull Cave
investigate the reports of strange happenings near Wolfskull Cave
quest.description:
There have been reports of weird happenings near Wolfskull Cave. Travelers disappearing, odd lights. I suspect wild animals or perhaps bandits.
The cave has a bad history. Long ago, Potema the Wolf Queen used it for necromantic rituals. That's where it got the name. That was over 500 years ago. Nothing much down there now - but everyone's always convinced the cave is haunted.
I don't think it's worth our time with the war going on, but if you want to clear out the cave, I'll make sure you're repaid for your work.

kbs.name: Aran Linvail
kbs.description: a man leading a guild of thieves

kbs.name: Graveyard District
kbs.description: a city district with a large graveyard

kbs.name: Bodhi
kbs.description: an intelligent, brutal female vampire, and the leader of the rival guild

plots: the player was on a mission for Aran Linvail last night: Bodhi attacked Aran Linvail's guild in the meantime
there is a network of tombs beneath the graves where another spy tracked one of Bodhi's servants: the player shall find a set of blue doors just north of a spider den
the doors are too heavy for any mortal to open: Aran Linvail sends a mage to open the doors for the player
Aran Linvail gives the player stakes: the stakes can kill vampires permanently

quest.title: A Counter-attack
quest.objective: find the rival guild's hideout, and destroy the rival guild
tasks: Go to Graveyard District.
find the rival guild's hideout
find the rival guild's hideout, and destroy the rival guild
quest.description:
You were not the only one who was busy last night.
The leader of this rival guild, Bodhi by name, made a daring attack upon us. She can only be a vampire, and I suspect many of her servants are as well. The time has come to strike back to protect our people and the city she has invaded.
Go to the Graveyard District and find their hideout. There is a network of tombs beneath the graves where another spy tracked one of Bodhi's servants. There you shall find a set of blue doors just north of a spider den. The doors are too heavy for any mortal to open, but the vampires likely pass with ease. I shall send a mage to meet you there and arrange for the doors to be opened. Here, you shall need these stakes if you are to truly finish these creatures.
Be on your guard. This Bodhi is the most intelligent and brutal foe I have ever had. If we are lax in our vigilance, we will be at the disadvantage. When you have destroyed their evil, return to me and I will fulfill our bargain.

kbs.name: Boethiah
kbs.description: the goddess of destruction, Molag Bal's rival

plots: the player tried to take the mace on Molag Bal's shrine: Molag Bal imprisoned the player with sharp spikes

quest.title: Dominion and Humiliation
quest.objective: help Molag Bal take revenge upon a priest of Boethiah who desecrated Molag Bal's shrine
tasks: save the priest of Boethiah from imprisonment
help Molag Bal take revenge upon a priest of Boethiah who desecrated Molag Bal's shrine
quest.description:
Fool! Did you think Molag Bal, the Lord of Domination, would so easily reward you? What do you see from that little cage? Speak.
You definitely see the spikes of your cage. Sharp, aren't they? This was the last thing many saw before they were sacrificed in my name. But even a god has his enemies, and my rival Boethiah had her priest desecrate it. So long since it's tasted blood. Until you came.
I want submission. I want the priest who did this to bend his knee and give me his soul. He comes by to perform Boethiah's insulting rites at my altar, but he's been missing. Captured and bound. Left to rot.
You'll get the freedom your kind enjoys so much. Save the priest. Let him perform his rite one more time. And when he does, we will be waiting for him.
Then you will be finally rewarded. The Mace of Molag Bal! I give you its true power, mortal. When your enemies lie broken and bloody before you, know that I will be watching.

plots: Lily wants knowledge
the player is an enemy of Lily
the player can get to the Nether with a portal made out of obsidian: take a look at ruined portals scattered around the world

quest.title: Intentional Game Design
quest.objective: try to sleep in a bed in the Nether, and report back to Lily
tasks: Reach Nether.
go to the Nether
try to sleep in a bed in the Nether, and report back to Lily
quest.description:
Why are you talking to me? Can't you just steer clear of me?
If you really want to do something interesting, though, I've got something fun for you. Go to the Nether. You know, the lethal hellish dimension? You can get there with a portal made out of obsidian. Take a look at the various ruined portals dotting the landscape. Try to sleep in a bed there, and report back to me. I'm very interested in hearing the results of this little experiment.
If the things I've heard about the Nether are true that should teach you a lesson... and I'll even give you a shiny diamond.

kbs.name: Durnehviir
kbs.description: a dragon, and a reluctant servant of the Ideal Masters

kbs.name: Soul Cairn
kbs.description: a terrible dimension that imprisons souls

plots: the player fought against Durnehviir in the past: Durnehviir respects the player

quest.title: Durnehviir
quest.objective: learn a dragon shout from Durnehviir
tasks: Arrive at Tamriel.
summon Durnehviir by speaking his name to the heavens
learn a dragon shout from Durnehviir
quest.description:
My desire to speak with you was born from the result of our battle. I merely wish to respectfully ask a favor of you.
For countless years I've roamed the Soul Cairn, in unintended service to the Ideal Masters. Before this, I roamed the skies above Tamriel. I desire to return there.
I fear that my time here has taken its toll upon me. I share a bond with this dreaded place. If I ventured far from the Soul Cairn, my strength would begin to wane until I was no more.
I will place my name with you and grant you the right to call my name from Tamriel. Do me this simple honor and I will fight at your side as your Grah-Zeymahzin, your Ally, and teach you my Thu'um.
Simply speak my name to the heavens when you feel the time is right.

kbs.name: Golden Gear
kbs.description: important object related to defense of Zeryphesh

plots: Lord Taldimut has been studying the crests

quest.title: The Lost Key
quest.objective: help Lord Taldimut bring the Golden Gear to Zeryphesh
tasks: Travel to Whispering Cave.
recover the Golden Gear
help Lord Taldimut bring the Golden Gear to Zeryphesh
quest.description: I have continued studying the crests, and I am more convinced than ever that the Golden Gear is hidden in the the Whispering Cave. If you can retrieve it, I can bring it back to Zeryphesh, to aid in the city's defense against the Ezrohir siege.

kbs.name: a village
relations: a place of the player's choosing

kbs.name: a place of the player's choosing
kbs.description: a place of the player's choosing

kbs.name: Wither
kbs.description: [Enemy] an extremely dangerous skeletal creature capable of bombing out everything in its surroundings

plots: Tove wants reputation
Tove draws the summoning pattern of the Wither for the player

quest.title: Withering Away
quest.objective: kill the Wither
tasks: Arrive at Nether.
Make your way to a place of the player's choosing.
gather up 3 wither skeleton skulls, and 4 blocks of soul sand
summon the Wither with the gathered items
kill the Wither
quest.description:
I'm a storyteller. I always like to hear new stories that I can pass along to the people of this village.
Old legends tell about a mighty skeletal creature known only as the "Wither." It is said that it can bomb out everything in its surroundings. If you killed the Wither, I'd give you a rare Nether Star as a reward.
I'll draw you the summoning pattern of the Wither. You need to gather up certain items from the hellish Nether: three wither skeleton skulls, and four blocks of soul sand. Use these items to summon the Wither.

plots: Quallo is standing next to a creature that he calls a friend
the blade is hidden

quest.title: Solve the Riddle of the Sewers
quest.objective: follow the One's path, and return to Quallo
tasks: Head to where the topside filth drains.
find the clues from the One
follow the One's path, and return to Quallo
quest.description:
I'm Quallo, and this thing here is my friend.
You have come for the blade, I suppose. It is as we have always expected, my friend. (He glances to the creature beside him.) Too long in this pit, too long.
The gleam in your eye! It belies your greed, your passion. I've found this blade, child! It is hidden most insidiously. A cruel jest has been played upon us all. My friend here knows this!
The One has left clues for you. Have you not found the clues? Where the topside filth drains, there are the clues. Return to me ere you follow the One's path, for there is much that you must learn.

kbs.name: Half-Moon Mill
kbs.description: a mill ran by Hern and Hert

kbs.name: Hern
kbs.description: a male vampire who has blended into the human society

plots: Hert is always near Hern

quest.title: Undead to Plain Dead
quest.objective: assassinate Hern
tasks: Find your way to Half-Moon Mill.
find Hern
assassinate Hern
quest.description:
You are going to assassinate Hern. He's a vampire, and has blended into human society for years. He's never far from his female companion, Hert. Also a vampire.
The contract is for the male, Hern. But you'll probably have to contend with the female, too. They both live in Half-Moon Mill. So for Sithis' sake, watch yourself.
Face a vampire, and live to tell the tale!

plots: the Thalmor are also looking for Esbern

quest.title: A Cornered Rat
quest.objective: locate Esbern, and ask where he was on the 30th of Frostfall
tasks: Find your way to Riften.
talk to Brynjolf about finding Esbern
locate Esbern, and ask where he was on the 30th of Frostfall
quest.description:
We've got to find Esbern in Riften before the Thalmor do. He'll know how to stop the dragons if anybody does. You'd better get to Riften. Talk to Brynjolf. He's... well-connected. A good starting point at least.
Oh, and when you find Esbern... if you think I'm paranoid... you may have some trouble getting him to trust you. Just ask him where he was on the 30th of Frostfall. He'll know what it means.

plots: wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: Lurkers in Shadows
quest.objective: find out what the suspicious person is after
tasks: Find your way to Cocoa Hamlet.
find and follow the suspicious person at dusk
find out what the suspicious person is after
quest.description:
I almost didn't see you there, Hero. I'm succumbed in deep, dark thoughts at the moment.
Someone's been spying on our village for quite some time. I personally spotted that suspicious individual coming here around dusk.
Perhaps that person is plotting something malicious, perhaps not. Regardless, I'm worried that something bad might happen to Cocoa Hamlet. You, Hero, are the right person to find out what that suspicious person is up to. The jungle can hide many dangers in its deep thickets of trees and vines. Find and follow the suspicious person, here in Cocoa Hamlet.
We can give you a diamond for your time. An adventurer found it in an abandoned jungle temple a long time ago.

kbs.name: Karthwasten
kbs.description: a small village pressed against the stone, to the north

kbs.name: Sybil
kbs.description: a mortal woman who proclaims the will of Dibella

kbs.name: Dibella
kbs.description: the goddess of love and passion

kbs.name: Exalted Protocol of the Dibellan Sybil
kbs.description: a secret ceremony known to the priestesses of Dibella, which is used to find a new Sybil after the death of the previous one

plots: the player breached the inner sanctum of the Temple of Dibella and interrupted the Exalted Protocol of the Dibellan Sybil

quest.title: The Heart of Dibella
quest.objective: find a new Sybil for the Temple of Dibella
tasks: Reach Karthwasten.
retrieve the new Sybil, a young girl
find a new Sybil for the Temple of Dibella
quest.description:
You have committed a breach, and must pay the penalty. Normally, a quick death would be required. Luckily for you, there are more pressing matters.
The ceremony you so rudely interrupted was the Exalted Protocol of the Dibellan Sybil. I don't expect you to know what that means. Suffice to say that our Sybil was recently lost to us. Through the ceremony, we have seen the home of the next Sybil, to the north, in a small village pressed against the stone.
If you can travel there, and retrieve our young Sybil, your transgression will be forgiven. We believe the place in our vision to be Karthwasten. Now move quickly. The girl must be brought to the temple as soon as possible.
You, my dear, can earn the blessing of Dibella as your reward.

kbs.name: Azura
kbs.description: the queen of dawn and dusk, one of the Daedric Princes

plots: 5 followers of Azura slew Dratik and its vampire kin: the 5 followers of Azura were infected with vampirism and sealed themselves in the Gutted Mine

quest.title: Azura's Unfortunate Followers
quest.objective: perform a service to Azura
tasks: Proceed to Gutted Mine.
kill 5 followers of Azura
perform a service to Azura
quest.description:
Greetings, traveler. I am Azura, known as the Queen of Dawn and Dusk.
I have seen your name, traveler, and heard it whispered in twilight. I ask a service, which holds promise of fame and reward.
Many years ago, five followers of mine slew the vampire Dratik and its kin, but all were infected by the foul creature. Knowing their fate, they sealed themselves up in the vampire's lair. Their suffering weighs heavily on me. Five bright candles shall burn forever in memory of their sacrifice.
Travel to the Gutted Mine. The door will open to you. Bring the peace of death to my followers, and you shall earn my gratitude. For your service, you shall have my Star, that your deeds might be entered in the Book of Fate.

kbs.name: Jane
relations: an ocean ruin far west of here

kbs.name: an ocean ruin far west of here
kbs.description: an ocean ruin far west of here

plots: Jane wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: That Belongs to a Library!
quest.objective: recover writings of a lost culture for Jane
tasks: Find your way to an ocean ruin far west of here.
find the writings of a lost culture
recover writings of a lost culture for Jane
quest.description:
There are ruins scattered on both land and the bottom of the sea, hero. These ruins tell us many things about the people who inhabited them: their hardships and hopes.
I'm not a hero like you, just your everyday librarian. I know of a submerged ruin in an ocean far west of here that you could explore. I implore you: find writings of a lost culture that lived in the ruin. The writings will be reduced to a lump of watery paper, if we don't recover them in time.
I have some unused bookshelves that I could give you in return. Even heroes need to civilize themselves with quality literature sometimes.

kbs.name: General Tullius
kbs.description: the player's leader in the Imperial Legion

kbs.name: Ulfric
kbs.description: the man who leads the Stormcloaks

plots: General Tullius is addressing the player and the player's fellow legionnaires: the best and the brightest warriors in Tamriel

quest.title: Extinguishing the Flames of Rebellion
quest.objective: put an end to the Stormcloak rebellion
tasks: Make your way to Windhelm.
fight your way in Ulric's castle, and make Ulfric face justice
put an end to the Stormcloak rebellion
quest.description:
All right. It's time to deliver the final blow to the Stormcloak rebellion. You all have fought bravely, and sacrificed much to bring us to this point.
Ulfric thinks he can hide behind the walls of his castle. But we will fight our way in and drag him out through the rubble to face justice. Because this is the end for them, the Stormcloaks will fight like cornered rats. They will be fierce and crafty. But they are no match for Legionnaires.
You are the best and the brightest warriors in Tamriel. Professional soldiers, fearless and devastating. The Emperor will be paying close attention to what happens here today. Men who distinguish themselves will be well rewarded.
Ready now! Everyone, with me! For the Empire! For the Legion!

kbs.name: Tonilia
kbs.description: a fence, and a fellow member of the Thieves Guild

kbs.name: Ri'saad
kbs.description: the male leader of the caravans that travel across the realm

plots: the caravans are notorious for transporting illegal substances

quest.title: Deal Like A Steal
quest.objective: secure a merchandise transportation deal for the Thieves Guild
tasks: deliver a satchel of Moon Sugar to Ri'saad to secure the deal
secure a merchandise transportation deal for the Thieves Guild
quest.description:
Before we get down to business, I've got something I need you to do.
Well, as you know, the Guild's growing and things are looking up around here. The only thing we're lacking is a reliable way to transport our merchandise across the land.
I'm not sure if you've noticed, but there are several caravans that travel across the realm. They're shrewd traders and don't mind getting their hands dirty.
I've bartered with their leader, Ri'saad, on more than one occasion. I want you to bring him something. You see, the caravans are notorious for transporting illegal substances.
Present Ri'saad with this satchel of Moon Sugar, and I bet my last coin he'll make a deal.

kbs.name: a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District
kbs.description: a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District

kbs.name: Book of Kaza
relations: a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District

plots: Korgan Bloodaxe and his fellows were on a mission to obtain the Book of Kaza for a book collector
Korgan Bloodaxe and his fellows had a heated argument: only Korgan Bloodaxe remained alive afterwards

quest.title: Help Korgan Recover the Book of Kaza
quest.objective: bring the the Book of Kaza to the book collector
tasks: Head to a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District.
find the Book of Kaza with Korgan Bloodaxe
bring the the Book of Kaza to the book collector
quest.description:
I'm scouring for a band of desperate adventurers to aid me in a gallant task. Come and hear Korgan Bloodaxe's tale!
A fortnight past, me fellows and I were in the midst of obtaining an ancient text fer our patron when a skirmish visited our midst. Vile words, alas, became a lake of bloodshed. So it goes the sacred grimoire ne'er made it to our benefactor's hand. And now he awaits its arrival with a zeal reserved for a grog-blossom in an alekeg. The scuttlebutt is the pay is handsome and worthy of note — sacks of loot and odd magics. The volume sits not far from 'ere, and the bibliomaniac, he paces the floor in the meantime. 'Tis called the Book of Kaza.
The Book of Kaza is in some hobnail's tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District. It's nae abandoned, but rumors and half-truths only scare the young and infirm. Keeps the curious away, me guess.
Well... it'll take far more than a few shambling bags of skin and stitches to deter Korgan Bloodaxe from a king's ransom! A foolhardy jaunt into a hive of undead? How could ye resist?

kbs.name: Isran
kbs.description: the player's leader in the Dawnguard
relations: Reach, trying to find dwarven ruins

kbs.name: Sorine Jurard
kbs.description: a smart Breton girl, who is good with tinkering and fascinated with the Dwemer and their weapons
relations: Reach, trying to find dwarven ruins

kbs.name: Reach, trying to find dwarven ruins
kbs.description: Reach, trying to find dwarven ruins

kbs.name: Gunmar
kbs.description: a big, brutish Nord man, who trains animals, especially trolls
relations: Reach, trying to find dwarven ruins

plots: the Dawnguard is fighting against powerful vampires, who have an Elder Scroll

quest.title: A New Order
quest.objective: recruit Isran's old allies for the Dawnguard
tasks: find Sorine Jurard and Gunmar, and recruit them for the Dawnguard
recruit Isran's old allies for the Dawnguard
quest.description:
We're up against powerful vampires, unlike anything we've seen before. And they have an Elder Scroll.
There are people I've met and worked with over the years. We need their skills, their talents, if we're going to survive this.
I think we'll want Sorine Jurard. Breton girl, whip-smart and good with tinkering. Fascination with the Dwemer. Weapons in particular. Last I knew, she was out in the Reach, convinced she was about to find the biggest dwarven ruins yet. You'll also want to find Gunmar. Big brute of a Nord, hates vampires almost as much as I do. Got it into his head years back that his experience with animals would help. Trolls in particular, from what I hear.
If you can find them, we might have a chance.

kbs.name: Peryite
kbs.description: the god of infection and pestilence

plots: Orchendor was sent to gather Afflicted to Bthardamz: Orchendor betrayed Peryite afterwards

quest.title: The Only Cure
quest.objective: kill Orchendor, and return to Peryite
tasks: Reach Bthardamz.
find Orchendor
kill Orchendor, and return to Peryite
quest.description:
I have watched you for some time, you know. The decisions you've made intrigue me, and I wonder if you are the proper agent for a task of mine.
I sent a blessing to the world, a wasting plague that infected a scattering of Breton villages. One of my monks, the elf Orchendor, was sent to gather these Afflicted. He shepherded them into Bthardamz for me, but has since lost his way.
I will not stand for betrayal. I want you to go to Bthardamz and kill Orchendor, in my name. I can grant you a powerful token for this task. An escutcheon of dwarven make, capable of shielding you from both the spell and sword. Return when the elf lies dead and it will be yours.

plots: Jim wants reputation
the player is a known villain

quest.title: A Faithful Servant
quest.objective: bring a load of sticks to Jim
tasks: Go to all kinds of forests.
chop down trees to obtain wood
craft sticks from wood
bring a load of sticks to Jim
quest.description:
What! NO! Please spare me, oh dark master! I promise I'll be your best servant. A minion of unshaken loyalty.
If my arrows were known to be the best, your dark influence would spread across the land! Please, master. Bring me a load of sticks so I can craft arrows en masse.
Master, you need to chop down trees in a forest of any kind, and then craft the wood from the trees into sticks.

kbs.name: Nether Fortress
kbs.description: a terrible fortress in the Nether, inhabited by fierce creatures

plots: Yves wants reputation

quest.title: Tales of Terror
quest.objective: visit a Nether Fortress, and report back to Yves
tasks: Travel to Nether.
Travel to Nether Fortress.
go to the Nether
find a Nether Fortress
visit a Nether Fortress, and report back to Yves
quest.description:
I love to tell stories to others. I'd like to bolster my reputation as a storyteller with some novel, unheard stories about the Nether. To recount its dangers and hellish nature...
A witness' account of a Nether Fortress would help me devise some dashing tales. A terrible fortress with equally terrible inhabitants...
Would you be my witness? Please, go to the Nether and find a Nether Fortress. Visit it, and tell me all about it. I'll have a diamond for you. It should entice you to help me.

kbs.name: Raminus Polus
kbs.description: the player's superior in the Mages Guild

plots: the player is an Associate of the Mages Guild
the player has been found guilty of theft: the player's Mages Guild privileges have been suspended

quest.title: Mages Guild Suspension
quest.objective: collect alchemy samples to regain your Mages Guild membership
tasks: deliver 20 Dragon's Tongue and 20 Redwort to Raminus Polus
collect alchemy samples to regain your Mages Guild membership
quest.description:
It is unfortunate that we should meet under these circumstances, Associate. You have been found guilty of theft. As such, your guild privileges have been suspended. If you wish to be reinstated, you must perform a service for the guild. Are you willing to do so?
Make no mistake: this task is simple, but has a purpose. In selflessly serving the guild, at risk to yourself, while putting your own feelings aside, you prove your devotion to the cause. You will help replenish alchemical supplies for the guild.
Deliver 20 Dragon's Tongue flowers, and 20 Redwort flowers to me. Surprised? Annoyed? It is not unexpected. Nevertheless, that is your path to re-acceptance in the guild.

kbs.name: Lord Skarmaen
kbs.description: a nobleman who hates Lilith, one of the Alibakkars

kbs.name: the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the graveyard
kbs.description: the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the graveyard

kbs.name: Lilith
kbs.description: a noblewoman, one of the Lurraxols

kbs.name: Mantle of Waukeen
relations: the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the graveyard

plots: both Lilith and Lord Skarmaen asked to see the player before
the Alibakkars and the Lurraxols have been feuding for generations
the Lurraxols think that their family founded Trademeet
Lord Skarmaen wants the Mantle of Waukeen to prove that his family founded Trademeet
Lord Skarmaen will give the player the key to the tomb

quest.title: The Dueling Families of Trademeet
quest.objective: bring the Mantle of Waukeen to Lord Skarmaen
tasks: Make your way to the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the graveyard.
find the Mantle of Waukeen
bring the Mantle of Waukeen to Lord Skarmaen
quest.description:
Hello once again!
It is pleasing to see that you did not respond to the call of that harlot, Lilith Lurraxol. The woman is too deluded to see the truth, as I said. A commoner that has risen above her station. Our two houses have been feuding for generations. The Lurraxols seem to be possessed of the notion that their family founded this town... what an absurd thought!
Why they would even presume to suppose such a thing, I have no idea. It is sad, however, that the Alibakkars have never had the evidence to prove our claim to them... though it galls me that we would need it. All that has recently changed. An old tome belonging to my family states that there is proof — that proof can be found right here in Trademeet. In the graveyard is a tomb that has been long abandoned... but which also houses the founder of the town. My ancestor. With him lies a large circlet called the Mantle of Waukeen.
Possessing that circlet would be all the proof I need, so I wish to acquire it. I would do so myself, but there happens to be a good reason the tomb is abandoned. It is... haunted, so they say. The exact nature of its danger I do not know... but you are a hero who surely could face its perils and return safely with the mantle, yes? In return, I shall pay you 1,000 gold. I shall give you the key, then, which will allow you into the tomb... the key itself having been in my family for some time as well. More proof, yes? Go, then, and return with the mantle.

kbs.name: Sheogorath
kbs.description: the Prince of Madness and the Lord of the Never-There, one of the Daedric Princes

kbs.name: Gatekeeper
kbs.description: a creature that guards the Gates of Madness

plots: the Shivering Isles lie through the door behind Haskill
Sheogorath seeks a mortal to act as his Champion
the Gatekeeper dislikes strangers to the Shivering Isles

quest.title: Through the Fringe of Madness
quest.objective: become Sheogorath's champion
tasks: get past the Gates of Madness
become Sheogorath's champion
quest.description:
I am Haskill, Chamberlain to the Lord Sheogorath.
You approach the Shivering Isles. Through the door behind me lies the realm of Sheogorath, Prince of Madness, Lord of the Never-There.
My Lord seeks a mortal to act as His Champion. Perhaps the Lord Sheogorath will find a use for you. You'll want to pass through the Gates of Madness. Oh, and mind the Gatekeeper. He dislikes strangers to the Realm.

plots: wants security
the player is an infamous person

quest.title: Woodland Security
quest.objective: make Whispering Pines safer for villagers
tasks: Make your way to Whispering Pines.
build some iron golems
make Whispering Pines safer for villagers
quest.description:
You scared me! Although I suppose that even someone as infamous as you isn't quite as spooky as Whispering Pines.
That taiga forest is not safe! Many villagers have gone missing there; never to be seen ever again. There must be something that could be done to make the forest safer for us villagers...
Perhaps you could go and build some iron golems in Whispering Pines? That would make the forest much safer! You'd even receive a worthy gift for doing this feat.

kbs.name: Mateo
kbs.description: a young man, and a faithful soldier

kbs.name: Ardic Santele
kbs.description: the missing son of Countess Santele, and the primary witness in the traitor investigation

plots: someone opened a secret gate into Saradush: the enemy came through a small sewer outlet that was protected by both a locked iron grate and several powerful magical wards
the Saradush guard found three soldiers in the area: Mateo, Ardic Santele, and Kiser Jhaeri
Countess Santele told the Saradush guard that Ardic Santele had implicated Mateo before Ardic Santele disappeared
the jailer will let the player see Mateo

quest.title: Justice for Mateo
quest.objective: discover the real traitor
tasks: Find your way to Mateo's cell.
talk to Mateo
discover the real traitor
quest.description:
My name is Captain Samand, and I'm a very busy man right now.
A few days ago, someone opened a secret gate into the town — Saradush could easily have been overrun. We just discovered the traitor was a young man named Mateo. There's no doubt in my mind that *someone* betrayed us. The enemy came through a small sewer outlet that was protected by both a locked iron grate and several powerful magical wards. There is no way to open that entrance from the outside. But Mateo is a faithful soldier, not the type of man to betray Saradush.
An alarm was raised, and my soldiers arrived only a few moments after the gate was opened. We found three soldiers in the area: Mateo, Ardic Santele, and the merchant Kiser Jhaeri. We didn't get a chance to complete our investigations. Ardic, the son of the Countess Santele, disappeared. He was our primary witness. Our attention was focused on the vile Kiser Jhaeri, but we had no proof. Then the countess told us that Ardic, her son, had implicated Mateo before he disappeared.
If you wish to investigate further, I will not stand in your way. Speak to Mateo in his cell. The jailer will let you see him.

kbs.name: Beregost
relations: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn

kbs.name: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn
kbs.description: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn

plots: Landrin gives the player antidote potions against poison

quest.title: Landrin's Possessions
quest.objective: deal with the spider infestation in Landrin's cellar
tasks: Travel to Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn.
kill spiders, and fetch Landrin's husband's boots and Landrin's bottle of wine
deal with the spider infestation in Landrin's cellar
quest.description:
Hey, I'm Landrin.
I've got an infestation of poisonous spiders in my cellar in Beregost. You'll know the house when you see it: just to the west of the Jovial Juggler Inn.
Here, take these potions with you. They're antidotes against the poison.
Keep whatever you don't use and I'll give you an extra 120 gold pieces if you bring back my husband's old boots that he keeps down there. If you bring back one of their bodies and my ol' bottle of wine as well, I might toss in a little something extra too.

kbs.name: Countess Valga
kbs.description: a female noble ruling over Chorrol

plots: the last tenant of Arborwatch has cleaned the place of furniture
Seed-Neeus should have furniture for sale

quest.title: Buying a house in Chorrol
quest.objective: purchase Arborwatch
tasks: give 20,000 gold to Countess Valga
purchase Arborwatch
quest.description:
It is a pleasure to meet you. I am Countess Valga of Chorrol.
Are you looking for a house to buy? There is a positively gorgeous home for sale right on the main plaza. You'll be hard pressed to find a nicer home for sale in Chorrol.
The house is called Arborwatch, and it costs 20,000 gold to buy the house from me. It would be a pleasure to have you become a citizen of Chorrol.
The last tenant of Arborwatch has cleaned the place of furniture. I'd recommend stopping by Northern Goods and Trade. The owner, Seed-Neeus, should have everything you need.

kbs.name: Kitt
relations: a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement

kbs.name: a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement
kbs.description: a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement

plots: Kitt wants serenity
the player a friend of Kitt
Kitt gives the player a potion of water breathing

quest.title: A Bringer of Hope
quest.objective: recover a bundle of potion ingredients for Kitt
tasks: Proceed to a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement.
find the bundle of potion ingredients
recover a bundle of potion ingredients for Kitt
quest.description:
The ship sank. All those poor sailors have now passed the veil to the other side. This is a sad day for us all.
My friend, that ship carried important potion ingredient for our village. Most of the goods that are not produced here are transported here by the sea. Now I can't fashion remedies for our villagers, and the next shipment will not be here for a long time.
You are a good person. I ask you to find a bundle of life-saving potion ingredients for me. That would mean a lot for the whole village! The bundle should be in the sunken ship east of here. Here, this potion of water breathing should help you dive to the ship save and sound.
I'll even let you have my old, extra brewing stand as a gift upon your return. Be careful while you dive; there a many lethal things lurking beneath the waves. I'd hate to bury a friend.

kbs.name: Lucien Lachance
kbs.description: an assassin, giving quest via "Dead Drop Orders #6"

kbs.name: a small campsite, on the summit of Gnoll Mountain
kbs.description: a small campsite, on the summit of Gnoll Mountain

kbs.name: Alval Uvani
relations: a small campsite, on the summit of Gnoll Mountain

kbs.name: Havilstein Hoar-Blood
kbs.description: a male Nord barbarian, lives alone and exposed
relations: a small campsite, on the summit of Gnoll Mountain

plots: "Dead Drop Orders #6" is addressed toward Silencer
Silencer assassinated Alval Uvani like all the others
Havilstein Hoar-Blood savagely butchered the chieftain of a mead hall on Solstheim
in the flooded section of Nornal, Silencer will find a chest submerged in the water: the chest contains contains Silencer's reward for killing Havilstein Hoar-Blood, and Silencer's next contract

quest.title: The Coldest Sleep
quest.objective: receive Silencer's next contract after killing Havilstein Hoar-Blood
tasks: Make your way to a small campsite, on the summit of Gnoll Mountain.
assassinate Havilstein Hoar-Blood
receive Silencer's next contract after killing Havilstein Hoar-Blood
quest.description:
Dead Drop Orders #6
by Lucien Lachance

Alval Uvani is dead, just like all the others. You continue to impress me, Silencer, and I am only too eager to indulge your homicidal instincts.
Your next target is a savage Nord barbarian, living alone and exposed at a small campsite on the summit of Gnoll Mountain. This barbarian, Havilstein Hoar-Blood by name, savagely butchered the chieftain of a mead hall on the island of Solstheim. The chieftain's sister has forgone the Nord custom of extracting the monetary retribution of wergild, and instead wants Hoar-Blood to pay with his life. You, dear Silencer, will help put her family at peace.
You are to go to Gnoll Mountain, locate Havilstein Hoar-Blood, and send his soul to the great beyond.
When Hoar-Blood has been executed, journey to the ancient ruin of Nornal. In the flooded section of that ruin you will find a chest, submerged in the water. As you may have guessed, the chest contains your reward for killing Havilstein Hoar-Blood, 500 gold, and your next contract.

plots: Firebead Elvenhair left his identify scroll to Tethtoril

quest.title: Firebead's Scroll
quest.objective: bring Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll to him
tasks: Proceed to the inner grounds.
get Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll from Tethtoril
bring Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll to him
quest.description:
I, Firebead Elvenhair, have a small errand for you.
I left an identify scroll with Tethtoril, in the inner grounds. He should be done examining it by now, so if you could fetch it for me, I'd be grateful. I have a great use for those types of scrolls.
Allow me to cast a little spell on you as a reward. It will protect you from any evil you might meet tonight.

plots: the player asked Marise Aravel how she keeps the food she sells so fresh

quest.title: Ice Cold
quest.objective: bring five ice wraith teeth to Marise Aravel
tasks: Travel to Ancient's Ascent.
find five ice wraith teeth
bring five ice wraith teeth to Marise Aravel
quest.description:
I picked up a trick from a master butcher. He showed me a way to grind up ice wraith teeth and use it as a preservative. Keeps everything cold and fresh, but only for a limited time.
I'm always looking to replenish my supply, so if you ever come across five of them, I'd be more than happy to take them off your hands. The last traveler that traded me some said he found them at a place called Ancient's Ascent.
Careful though, rumor has it a dragon makes its home there.

kbs.name: Vicente Valtieri
kbs.description: the player's superior at the guild of assassins

kbs.name: Imperial Prison
kbs.description: a prison where the player was imprisoned in the past

kbs.name: Valen Dreth
kbs.description: a male Dark Elf, and a frail prisoner of many years

plots: just outside of the Imperial Prison is a grating that leads to the sewers: it has recently been tightly locked, but Vicente Valtieri will provide a key

quest.title: Scheduled for Execution
quest.objective: assassinate Valen Dreth in the Imperial Prison
tasks: Reach Imperial City's sewers.
infiltrate the Imperial Prison via a set of secret tunnels
assassinate Valen Dreth in the Imperial Prison
quest.description:
Back for more? It just so happens I have another contract available, one that requires an expert in infiltration.
Ever broken out of jail? How do you feel about breaking into one? The Imperial Prison, to be exact. We need a prisoner... silenced. Can you do it?
Your target is a Dark Elf named Valen Dreth. He thinks he's safe in prison. He is tragically mistaken. A prisoner recently escaped from the prison, using a set of secret tunnels connecting to the Imperial City's sewer system. It's a perfect way inside. Just outside of the Imperial Prison is a grating that leads to the sewers. It has recently been tightly locked, but I will provide a key. It should be easy enough to locate Dreth in his small cell. Besides, I think you know the way, hmmm. He he he he he.
Valen Dreth has been imprisoned for many years. His tongue is sharp, but his body is limp and frail. He will prove an easy, pleasurable kill. You will receive a bonus if you fulfill the contract without killing any of the prison guards. Now go, and may the Night Mother go with you.

kbs.name: Temple of Dibella
kbs.description: a temple whose priests are exclusively women

plots: Degaine doesn't want the Thieves Guild to find out about his plans

quest.title: Lusting After Gold
quest.objective: steal a child-sized gold statue for Degaine
tasks: Head to Temple of Dibella.
sneak inside the temple and find the gold statue
steal a child-sized gold statue for Degaine
quest.description:
You see that Temple? Way up there. All them women, keeping to themselves.
Won't let poor Degaine in, no. Not even for a look. But they've got a treasure in there. Gold statue, size of a child. Who knows what they use it for, but I know what I'll use it for.
Stealing it and selling it for profit. Well let's not put it like that. Wouldn't want the Thieves Guild catching wind of us, eh? Nah, just creep in and have a go at taking it out. I'll be here, and pay you half of what my man in Riften promised for it.
You'll be helping out an old beggar, and the gods smile on that sort of thing.

kbs.name: Zeryphesh
kbs.description: a town a couple of days travel away from here

plots: the Vanquisher told the Imperial Railmaster that the player is coming to him

quest.title: Onward to Zeryphesh!
quest.objective: travel to Zeryphesh on the Imperial Railmaster's Embercraft
tasks: tell the Imperial Railmaster when your ready to go
travel to Zeryphesh on the Imperial Railmaster's Embercraft
quest.description: You're the one the Vanquisher lady told me about, then? Alright... whenever you're ready to get rollin', we'll get your gear aboard our Embercraft, and we'll set out to Zeryphesh. Shouldn't take us more than a couple of days to get there!

plots: the player purchased the Servants Quarters for Rosethorn Hall

quest.title: Helping Hands
quest.objective: hire a housekeeper for Rosethorn Hall
tasks: pay Eyja 150 gold to hire her as your housekeeper
hire a housekeeper for Rosethorn Hall
quest.description:
Hello, I heard you purchased the Servants Quarters for Rosethorn Hall, and I was wondering if you had anyone in mind to fill that position?
For 150 gold and a roof over my head, I'm yours. Well, to help around the house I mean.

plots: Dave wants knowledge
suspicious stew is mushroom stew laced with some flowers: it may have positive or negative effects on its eater

quest.title: Nothing Suspicious...
quest.objective: see what happens after eating suspicious stew, and report back to Dave
tasks: eat the suspicious stew Dave gives you
see what happens after eating suspicious stew, and report back to Dave
quest.description:
I keep the villagers fed. Without my crops, our village would surely face a famine!
Sometimes, I like to cook new foods using various natural ingredients to prepare us for poor harvests. This time, I tried to make some mushroom stew, but one of the villagers accidentally tripped, and dropped some flowers into the pot with the stew.
Traveler, could you please taste the suspicious mushroom stew? It can have either positive or negative effects on its eater. I'm giving you some.
Please see what happens after eating the suspicious stew, and report back to me. I'd hate to throw away the whole batch of mushroom stew for nothing. I'll even give you 10 emeralds for being a taster.

kbs.name: Phinis Gestor
kbs.description: the player's teacher in conjuration magic
relations: the top of the Hall of Attainment

kbs.name: the top of the Hall of Attainment
kbs.description: the top of the Hall of Attainment

kbs.name: Dremora
kbs.description: a humanoid creature from the planes of Oblivion
relations: the top of the Hall of Attainment

plots: the player has advanced quickly in their conjuration studies
Phinis Gestor will teach the player the spell to summon the Dremora, but it will only work in a place properly prepared for the event

quest.title: Your Will Be Done
quest.objective: learn powerful, new conjuration spells
tasks: Arrive at the top of the Hall of Attainment.
summon an unbound Dremora, prove that you are in control, and order the Dremora bring you a sigil stone from an Oblivion gate
learn powerful, new conjuration spells
quest.description:
How quickly you've advanced. Most impressive. There are spells yet to be learned, powerful spells that can more closely and more permanently bind creatures to your will. These spells are difficult, even for one as skilled as I. To even begin to inscribe them, I need something very special. A sigil stone from an Oblivion gate.
